meanings.definition: To eat food quickly and greedily.
meanings.sent1: The hungry dog chowed down on his dinner in seconds.
meanings.sent2: She chowed on the delicious pizza at the party.
meanings.sent3: The kids chowed through the snacks at the movie night.
meanings.sent4: The raccoon chowed through the garbage cans in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: He chowed through the challenge of finishing the giant burger.

meanings.sent1: After the meal, he chowed on a piece of gum.
meanings.sent2: She chowed gum all day long.
meanings.sent3: The cow chowed on the grass leisurely.
meanings.sent4: The machine chowed through the paper effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: He chowed on the tough steak for hours.

meanings.sent1: The family chowed on a hearty breakfast before the trip.
meanings.sent2: She chowed down on the sandwich during lunch.
meanings.sent3: The bear chowed through the berries in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The engine chowed through the fuel quickly.
meanings.sent5: He chowed through the buffet at the party.
